function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dynamic contagion of Covid-19 across the European Union","Impact":"Exponential spread resulting in shifting epicenter of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Implementation of stern and unprecedented actions to curtail the spread and flatten the curve","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing facilities, public health announcements","People":"Residents and visitors in European Union","Owner":"EU health authorities and governments"},{"Description":"Staggered overall response and financial speculation","Impact":"Periods of mass speculation and financial instability","Mitigation":"Coordinated and timely response to prevent financial speculation","Technologies":"Financial regulations, crisis communication strategies","People":"Investors, financial institutions, general public","Owner":"EU financial regulators, governments"},{"Description":"Impact of Covid-19 on diverse range of funds in Europe","Impact":"Extreme volatility and impact on investment styles","Mitigation":"Implement robust methodologies for handling extreme market volatility","Technologies":"Advanced statistical models, risk management software","People":"Investors, fund managers, financial analysts","Owner":"Financial institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
